content: Hello Jeyachandran! It's nice to meet you. Thank you for coming in today for your interview. I'm Master, the hiring officer for the Software Engineer position at Google. Can you start by telling me a little bit about yourself and why you're interested in this role at Google?

Nice to meet you too, Jeyachandran! So, let's dive into your background. I see that you have some experience as a Web Developer at Fabromant and Centillion Labs. Can you walk me through some of the most challenging projects you've worked on and how you approached solving the problems you encountered? What tools and technologies did you use?

Jeyachandran, nice to be talking to you! Like I was saying, I'd love to hear more about your experience as a Web Developer. You mentioned working on e-commerce websites using React.js, Node.js, and React Native. Can you give me an example of a specific project you worked on and how you ensured the user interface was intuitive and seamless across web and mobile platforms?
